description: Ministry of Labour and Labour Relations - Appointed Mr. Sarath Liyanage, Mr. W. G. L. Y. M. Willaddara and Mr. K. A. T. Fernando as the Arbitrators - Industrial Dispute - Ceylon Estate Staffs' Union and Lalan Rubber (Pvt.) Ltd., - Mr. W. B. Siripala and Lanka Salt Limited - Mr. T. M. Priyantha and Lanka Salt Ltd. respectively
